programme.desc: Tom Lane is the star columnist for the media conglomerate owned San Francisco Sun newspaper. The company is thinking about increasing Tom's exposure by producing a new television show around him. Liz Madison is the advice columnist for the little read community newspaper, the Marin County Voice, which is a throwback to gentler times. Besides their journalistic occupations, one other similar aspect between Tom and Liz is that they are both currently single, with their friends and family doing whatever they can to find that special someone for their personal life. On November 2, the staff at the Voice learn that the Sun ownership has bought their newspaper, with the probable goal of folding it into the operations of the Sun. If this move does happen, the staff at the Voice will lose their jobs. To fight back, Liz decides to change her column to an editorial espousing the meaning of Christmas and the newspaper to the community.

programme.desc: When Ramone discovers he is about to be King, he takes lessons from royal expert Angelica.

programme.title: Becoming Ms. Bennett: Pride & Prejudice
programme.desc: American vlogger lands role in British 'Pride and Prejudice' film, faces challenge mastering the accent.

programme.title: Joy & Hope
programme.desc: Romance author Ethan Dulane's writer's block compromises his ninth novel delivery deadline under contract, so his agent booked an inspirational holiday away from his Manhattan luxury apartment, on a horse ranch upstate.

programme.title: A Merry Single Christmas
programme.desc: Morgan goes to a singles retreat in order to get over her heartbreak and enjoy Christmas alone but her ex-Liam shows up and the fun begins.

programme.title: Christmas Tail
programme.desc: A heartwarming tale of friendship and love as single mom Maggie adopts a Labrador for her son Ethan.

programme.title: Christmas With A Prince
programme.desc: Pediatric specialist Tasha Miller is caring for two young patients plus one sinfully gorgeous royal. She knew Prince Alexander at boarding school long ago and thinks he's still a self-absorbed, incorrigible heartbreaker.

programme.title: Chasing Christmas
programme.desc: A burned-out Ghost of Christmas Past goes AWOL, leaving his target stranded in 1965 during the holidays.

programme.title: Rooftop Christmas Tree
programme.desc: Sarah, a lawyer, returns home to defend her lonely neighbor arrested for his annual rooftop Christmas tree.

programme.title: Vote One For Love
programme.desc: Candace is unexpectedly tasked with helping her former high school rival win a mayoral race.

programme.title: At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori teams up with Million Dollar Matchmaker Patti Stanger to host a series of dates for Morgan, one of her single friends.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Tiny’s bar will close unless he pays $17K; customers rally to save it. Meanwhile, Jay’s hazing alarms.

programme.title: The Wedding Rule
programme.desc: Gemma and Max, former childhood friends are bequeathed a restaurant but must pretend to be married.

programme.title: You, Me, and that Mountain Retreat
programme.desc: Partnered with nature-hating Nathan, Rebecca is put to the test during a work mountain retreat.

programme.title: A Match for the Prince
programme.desc: A matchmaker risks falling for a real-life prince before his royal wedding date.

programme.title: The Bouquet
programme.desc: Two estranged sisters set aside their differences to help their mother save her floral business.

programme.title: Cowboy & Indiana
programme.desc: With new found hope, former world champion bull rider is given a dangerous shot to regain his former glory.

programme.title: Buried Secrets
programme.desc: A cop-turned-writer creates suspicion when she publishes her first novel.

programme.title: The Grasshopper
programme.desc: Christine Adams leaves her small town in British Columbia at age 19 to follow her boyfriend to L.A., where he works for a bank. She soon gets bored and moves to Las Vegas and becomes a showgirl, eventually slipping into prostitution.

programme.desc: The mob, bent on murderous revenge, pursues a man they mistakenly believe responsible for the theft of one of their drug shipments. Their elusive prey, however, has plans of his own, and they also include revenge.

programme.title: Breaking Up
programme.desc: Monica, a schoolteacher, and Steve, a photographer, have been deeply in love for over two years now. However, their impulsive natures often push their fragile relationship into an on-and-off cycle.

programme.title: Mune
programme.desc: Necross, the former guardian of the sun, turns evil and steals it. Now, Mune, Glim and Sohone, three friends, must work together to retrieve it back from him.

credits.actor: Omar Sy,Izïa Higelin,Michael Gregorio,Benoît Allemane,Féodor Atkine,Joshua Ballard,Trevor Devall,Damien Boisseau

programme.title: Fallen

programme.title: DSC
programme.desc: Talented directors provide an entertaining insight into the most intriguing stories and anecdotes concerning some of their best works.

programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.
